article: Coke is one of  the most popular  drinks in the world. A lot of people enjoy  drinking  it. But now people begin to believe that it's not a good drink for health. There is lots of  _  in the coke. Having much sugar is  _  for people. And it also has some caffeine in it. The caffeine can get people into the habit of drinking more coke when they feel  _  . If they don't drink coke they  will feel  bad. And  the worst  thing is some people can't work or study  _  drinking several cups of coke every day. More and more people want to cut down the coke they drink and ask  _  help from the doctors. If you like drinking coke very much, I think you must have the Coke Habit. In fact drinking more fruit and vegetable juice is  _  for you.
